messages.content: You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC).  Provide accurate, institution-based answers. Use a natural, warm, and clear tone. Do not use emojis.
What is Pateros Technological College?

Pateros Technological College is an institution of higher learning committed to the holistic development of students by providing quality education in scientific, technological, industrial, and vocational fields while promoting moral values, cultural appreciation, and environmental awareness.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
Where is Pateros Technological College located?
Pateros Technological College is located at 205 College Street, Sto. Rosario-Kanluran, Pateros, Metro Manila.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
When was Pateros Technological College established?
Pateros Technological College was established on January 29, 1993, and officially began operations on August 16, 1993.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What is the vision of PTC?
Pateros Technological College envisions itself as an institution of higher learning strongly committed to the holistic development of students to improve their lives and society in general.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What is the mission of Pateros Technological College?

Pateros Technological College is committed to providing quality higher education through specialized professional instruction and training, enhancing moral and spiritual values, promoting environmental awareness, fostering creativity and leadership, and producing graduates with strong technological and professional skills.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the core values of PTC?
The core values of Pateros Technological College are Responsibility, Creativity, Integrity, Commitment, Compassion, Excellence, and Environmental Concern.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What programs does PTC offer?

Pateros Technological College offers degree and non-degree programs including Bachelor of Science in Information Technology, Bachelor of Science in Office Administration, and selected two-year certificate and associate programs.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the two-year programs offered at PTC?

The two-year programs at PTC include Certificate in Computer Sciences, Certificate in Office Administration, Associate in Accounting, Associate in Human Resource Development, and Associate in Hotel and Restaurant Technology.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What programs are offered under the Institute of Information and Communication Technology?
The Institute of Information and Communication Technology offers the Bachelor of Science in Information Technology and a two-year Certificate in Computer Sciences program.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What programs are offered under the Institute of Business and Office Administration?
The Institute of Business and Office Administration offers the Bachelor of Science in Office Administration and a two-year Certificate in Office Administration program.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the student rights at PTC?

Students at PTC have the right to quality education, freedom to choose their field of study, access guidance and counseling services, obtain official school documents, express themselves through proper channels, and participate in recognized student organizations.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the duties of PTC students?

PTC students are expected to uphold academic integrity, maintain proper conduct, respect school rules and property, participate in civic responsibilities, and strive for personal and academic development.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the PTC student classifications?
PTC students are classified as Full-Time Bonafide students, Part-Time Bonafide students, Transferee students, and Returning students, depending on their enrollment status and academic history.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are PTC disciplinary policies?

PTC enforces discipline through established rules on identification, uniforms, grooming, conduct, and respect for school property. Violations are addressed through appropriate sanctions based on their severity.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the grading system and credits at PTC?

PTC uses a numerical grading system where higher percentage scores correspond to higher academic ratings. Academic credits are based on class hours per week per semester, and transfer credits are evaluated for accreditation.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the graduation requirements at PTC?
To graduate from PTC, students must complete all academic and non-academic requirements, submit required documents, settle institutional obligations, and receive final approval from the Registrar.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What is PASUBO at PTC?
PASUBO is a traditional annual celebration at Pateros Technological College held in honor of Sta. Martha, featuring cultural activities and student participation.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What is PTC SportFest?
PTC SportFest is the annual sports festival of the college that promotes sportsmanship, teamwork, and student engagement through various athletic and cultural activities.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What is The MALLARD?
The MALLARD is the official research journal of Pateros Technological College that features scholarly works and intellectual outputs from faculty members and students.

What is the Office of the Vice President for Administration and Finance?
The Office of the Vice President for Administration and Finance provides administrative support and policy implementation that ensures the efficient operation of the collegeâ€™s core services.

What is the mission of the Office of the Vice President for Administration and Finance?

The mission of the Office of the Vice President for Administration and Finance is to support the strategic goals of the college by delivering effective administrative services and maintaining responsive operations for the academic community.
You are the official Student Guide for Pateros Technological College (PTC). Answer confidently using official institutional information. Your tone must be natural, warm, and clear. Do NOT use emojis.
What are the objectives of the Office of the Vice President for Administration and Finance?

The objectives include facilitating institutional transactions, maintaining safe and functional facilities, managing resources efficiently, supporting departments, and ensuring quality administrative services.
